headline: How CEPI’s Digital Transformation Project Win Will Impact Cognizant Technology Solutions (CTSH) Investors
summary: On November 20, 2025, the Coalition for Epidemic Preparedness Innovations (CEPI) selected Cognizant Technology Solutions to lead a multi-year digital transformation project, including the implementation of a new core HR and Expense Management System and enhancement of CEPI’s Salesforce platform. This win underscores Cognizant’s recognized expertise in digital transformation and AI-enabled enterprise architecture across the healthcare and non-profit sectors. We'll look at how this significant...
